sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import {
  Box,
  Flex,
  Heading,
  Image,
  Button,
  Input,
  InputGroup,
  InputLeftElement,
  Stack,
} from "@chakra-ui/react";

function App() {
  return (
    <Box bg="black" color="white" minH="100vh">
      <Flex
        justifyContent="space-between"
        alignItems="center"
        p="8"
        maxW="1200px"
        mx="auto"
      >
        <Stack spacing="8" w="full">
          <Heading as="h1" fontSize="6xl">
            Draw My Face
          </Heading>
          <Flex alignItems="center" justify="space-between">
            <Image src="https://via.placeholder.com/512x512" alt="Image 1" />
            <Box w="400px">
              <Image src="https://via.placeholder.com/512x512" alt="Upload Image" />
              <InputGroup size="md" mt="4">
                <InputLeftElement
                  pointerEvents="none"
                  children={<i className="fas fa-upload" />}
                />
                <Input type="file" />
                <Button>Upload</Button>
              </InputGroup>
            </Box>
          </Flex>
        </Stack>
      </Flex>
    </Box>
  );
}

export default App;
